item.title: Becoming the 3 Pct
item.description: A series of articles on how to become the 3% of people who actually make consistent profit in the financial market.

item.title: Becoming the 3 Pct P2 Risk Management
item.description: Becoming the 3% – Part 2 – Risk Management People always say survive before you thrive, for traders that’s particularly true.

item.title: Becoming the 3 Pct P3 Psychology
item.description: Becoming the 3% - Part 3 - Psychology Some people are born with the right aptitudes for becoming a good trader, these lucky people are:

item.title: Becoming the 3 Pct Unpacking the One Metric
item.description: Becoming the 3% - Unpacking the One Metric The One Metric - P/L When you’re still learning to trade and yet to be profitable, finding out a way to check if you’re on the right track is super important to your future trading success.

item.title: Trading
item.description: Day trading I have been working on my day trading skills for roughly 2 years now, the market I am focusing on is small-cap stocks using momentum strategies, typically on 1 or 5 minutes timeframes.
